title: ContactList
description:
A collection of contacts, e.g. for chatting to or calling multiple contacts.

The contact list schema does not explicitly include identifiers in the `id` section, as there is not a common standard for such identifiers. Applications can, however, populate this part of the contract with custom identifiers if so desired.

id.title: Contact List Identifiers
id.description: One or more identifiers that refer to the contact list in an OMS, EMS or related system. Specific key names for systems are expected to be standardized in future.

name.title: Name
name.description: An optional human-readable summary of the contact list

contacts.title: List of Contacts
contacts.description: An array of contact contexts that forms the list.
